items.name: ShowCategoryName
lines: The caption contains the category name of the category to which a data point belongs.

items.name: ShowCustomLabel
lines: The caption contains a custom label text, which belongs to a data point label.

items.name: ShowLegendSymbol
lines: The symbol of data series is additionally displayed in the caption.

items.name: ShowNumber
lines: if TRUE, the value that is represented by a data point is displayed next to it.

items.name: ShowNumberInPercent
lines: This is only effective, if ShowNumber is TRUE.
If this member is also TRUE, the numbers are displayed as percentages of a category.
That means, if a data point is the first one of a series, the percentage is calculated by using the first data points of all available series.

items.name: ShowSeriesName
lines: The name of the data series is additionally displayed in the caption.
